00023 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00024 #define setbits( _b, _len )             ( ( ( 1U << ( (_len) - 1 ) ) - 1U + ( 1U << ( (_len) - 1 ) ) ) << (_b) )
00025 
00026 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00029 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00030 #define setbit( _b )                    ( (unsigned)1 << (_b) )
00031 
00032 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00037 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 #define clrbits( _b, _len)              ( ~setbits( (_b), (_len) ) )
00039 
00040 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 #define clrbit( _b )                    ( ~setbit( _b ) )

00047 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00051 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00052 #define allbitset( _val, _mask )        ( ( (_val) & (_mask) ) == (_mask) )
00053 
00054 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00058 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00059 #define anybitset( _val, _mask )        ( ( (_val) & (_mask) )  != 0 )
00060 
00061 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00064 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00065 #define max_sint_val( _t )              ( setbits( 0, ( sizeof( _t ) * 8 ) - 1 ) )
00066 
00067 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00070 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00071 #define min_sint_val( _t )              ( ~max_sint_val( _t ) )
00072 
00073 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00076 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 #define max_uint_val( _t )              ( setbits( 0, ( sizeof( _t ) * 8 ) ) )

00083 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00084 #define offset_of( _s, _m )             ( (unsigned char *)&( ( (_s *)0 )->_m ) - (unsigned char *)0 )
00085

00089 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00090 #define cnt_of_array( _a )             ( sizeof( (_a) ) / sizeof( (_a)[0] ) )

00095 #define minval( _x, _y )                ( (_x) < (_y) ? (_x) : (_y) )
00096

00099 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00100 #define maxval( _x, _y )                ( (_x) > (_y) ? (_x) : (_y) )

00107     {                                   \

00109         {                               \
00110         return;                         \
00111         }                               \
00112     }   /* returnif */

00122         {                               \
00123         return( _value );               \
00124         }                               \
00125     }   /* returnif */
